protocol.name: P-GSE29543-1
text: VALUE = This is the final calculated measurement for each probe set identifier that has been made comparable across all samples and rows
ABS_CALL = A qualitative measurement indicating if the probe set is detected (Present; P), not detected (Absent; A), or marginally detected (Marginal;M)

DETECTION P-VALUE = A p-value indicating the significance of the Detection call. A Detection p-value measures the probability that the discrimination scores of all probe pairs in the probe set are above a certain level, and that the target is likely to be Present

protocol.name: P-GSE29543-2
text: VALUE = This is the final calculated measurement for each probe set identifier that has been made comparable across all samples and rows
ABS_CALL = A qualitative measurement indicating if the probe set is detected (Present; P), not detected (Absent; A), or marginally detected (Marginal;M)

DETECTION P-VALUE = A p-value indicating the significance of the Detection call. A Detection p-value measures the probability that the discrimination scores of all probe pairs in the probe set are above a certain level, and that the target is likely to be Presen

protocol.name: P-GSE29543-3
protocol.text: root segments seperated from 10-day-old seedlings grown on MS solid medium in growth chambers at 22 ºC with 16h light / 8h dark

protocol.name: P-GSE29543-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from plant tissues using a guanidine thiocyanate extraction buffer as described (Hu et al., 2000, Plant J, 24: 693-701)

protocol.name: P-GSE29543-5
protocol.text: Approximately 5 µg of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets

protocol.name: P-GSE29543-9
protocol.text: aerial organ segments seperated from 10-day-old seedlings grown on MS solid medium in growth chambers at 22 ºC with 16h light / 8h dark
